rows.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
rows.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.
rows.transliteration: bismillāhir raḥmānir raḥīm

rows.arabic: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَهُ ٱلْحَمْدُ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
rows.translation: Praise be to Allah, to Whom belong all things in the heavens and on earth: to Him be Praise in the Hereafter: and He is Full of Wisdom, acquainted with all things.
rows.transliteration: al-ḥamdu lillāhil ladhī lahu mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍi walahul ḥamdu fil-ākhirah ۚ wahuwal ḥakīmul khabīr

rows.arabic: يَعْلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعْرُجُ فِيهَا ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلرَّحِيمُ ٱلْغَفُورُ
rows.translation: He knows all that goes into the earth, and all that comes out thereof; all that comes down from the sky and all that ascends thereto and He is the Most Merciful, the Oft-Forgiving.
rows.transliteration: ya`lamu mā yaliju fil-arḍi wa mā yakhruju minhā wa mā yanzilu minas samā-i wa mā ya`ruju fīhā ۚ wahuwar raḥīmul ghafūr

rows.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَا تَأْتِينَا ٱلسَّاعَةُ ۖ قُلْ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّى لَتَأْتِيَنَّكُمْ عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ ۖ لَا يَعْزُبُ عَنْهُ مِثْقَالُ ذَرَّةٍ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَآ أَصْغَرُ مِن ذَٰلِكَ وَلَآ أَكْبَرُ إِلَّا فِى كِتَـٰبٍ مُّبِينٍ
rows.translation: The Unbelievers say, "Never to us will come the Hour": Say, "Nay! but most surely, by my Lord, it will come upon you;- by Him Who knows the unseen,- from Whom is not hidden the least little atom in the heavens or on earth: Nor is there anything less than that, or greater, but is in the Record Perspicuous:
rows.transliteration: waqālal ladhīna kafarū lā ta-tīnas sā`ah ۖ qul balā warabbī lata-tiyannakum `ālimil ghayb ۖ lā ya`zubu `anhu mithqālu dharratin fis samāwāti walā fil-arḍi walā aṣgharu min dhālika walā akbaru illā fī kitābin mubīn

rows.arabic: لِّيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَرِزْقٌ كَرِيمٌ
rows.translation: That He may reward those who believe and work deeds of righteousness: for such is Forgiveness and a Sustenance Most Generous."
rows.transliteration: liyajziyal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāt ۚ ulā-ika lahum maghfiratun warizqun karīm

rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوْ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِنَا مُعَـٰجِزِينَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مِّن رِّجْزٍ أَلِيمٌ
rows.translation: But those who strive against Our Signs, to frustrate them,- for such will be a Penalty,- a Punishment most humiliating.
rows.transliteration: wal ladhīna sa`aw fī āyātinā mu`ājizīna ulā-ika lahum `adhābun min rijzin alīm

rows.arabic: وَيَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْعِلْمَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ هُوَ ٱلْحَقَّ وَيَهْدِىٓ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
rows.translation: And those to whom knowledge has come see that the (Revelation) sent down to thee from thy Lord - that is the Truth, and that it guides to the Path of the Exalted (in might), Worthy of all praise.
rows.transliteration: wayaral ladhīna ūtul `il-mal ladhī unzila ilayka min rabbika huwal ḥaqqa wayahdī ilā ṣirāṭil `azīzil ḥamīd

rows.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هَلْ نَدُلُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٍ يُنَبِّئُكُمْ إِذَا مُزِّقْتُمْ كُلَّ مُمَزَّقٍ إِنَّكُمْ لَفِى خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
rows.translation: The Unbelievers say (in ridicule): "Shall we point out to you a man that will tell you, when ye are all scattered to pieces in disintegration, that ye shall (then be raised) in a New Creation?
rows.transliteration: waqālal ladhīna kafarū hal nadullukum `alā rajuliy yunabbi-ukum idhā muzziqtum kulla mumazzaqin innakum lafī khalqin jadīd

rows.arabic: أَفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَم بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌۢ ۗ بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ وَٱلضَّلَـٰلِ ٱلْبَعِيدِ
rows.translation: "Has he invented a falsehood against Allah, or has a spirit (seized) him?"- Nay, it is those who believe not in the Hereafter, that are in (real) Penalty, and in farthest error.
rows.transliteration: aftarā `alallāhi kadhiban am bihi jinnah ۗ balil ladhīna lā yu-minūna bil-ākhirati fil `adhābi waḍ ḍalālil ba`īd

rows.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِن نَّشَأْ نَخْسِفْ بِهِمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ أَوْ نُسْقِطْ عَلَيْهِمْ كِسَفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
rows.translation: See they not what is before them and behind them, of the sky and the earth? If We wished, We could cause the earth to swallow them up, or cause a piece of the sky to fall upon them. Verily in this is a Sign for every devotee that turns to Allah (in repentance).
rows.transliteration: afalam yaraw ilā mā bayna aydīhim wa mā khalfahum minas samā-i wal-arḍ ۚ in nasha-nakhsif bihimul-arḍa aw nusqiṭ `alayhim kisafan minas samā-i ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyatan likulli `abdin munīb

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا دَاوُۥدَ مِنَّا فَضْلًا ۖ يَـٰجِبَالُ أَوِّبِى مَعَهُۥ وَٱلطَّيْرَ ۖ وَأَلَنَّا لَهُ ٱلْحَدِيدَ
rows.translation: We bestowed Grace aforetime on David from ourselves: "O ye Mountains! Sing ye back the Praises of Allah with him! and ye birds (also)! And We made the iron soft for him;-
rows.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā dāwūda minnā faḍlā ۖ yājibālu awwibī ma`ahu waṭ ṭayr ۖ wa-alannā lahul ḥadīd

rows.arabic: أَنِ ٱعْمَلْ سَـٰبِغَـٰتٍ وَقَدِّرْ فِى ٱلسَّرْدِ ۖ وَٱعْمَلُوا۟ صَـٰلِحًا ۖ إِنِّى بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
rows.translation: (Commanding), "Make thou coast of mail, balancing well the rings of chain armour, and work ye righteousness; for be sure I see (clearly) all that ye do."
rows.transliteration: ani'-mal sābighātin waqaddir fis sard ۖ wa`malū ṣāliḥā ۖ innī bimā ta`malūna baṣīr

rows.arabic: وَلِسُلَيْمَـٰنَ ٱلرِّيحَ غُدُوُّهَا شَهْرٌ وَرَوَاحُهَا شَهْرٌ ۖ وَأَسَلْنَا لَهُۥ عَيْنَ ٱلْقِطْرِ ۖ وَمِنَ ٱلْجِنِّ مَن يَعْمَلُ بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِۦ ۖ وَمَن يَزِغْ مِنْهُمْ عَنْ أَمْرِنَا نُذِقْهُ مِنْ عَذَابِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
rows.translation: And to Solomon (We made) the Wind (obedient): Its early morning (stride) was a month's (journey), and its evening (stride) was a month's (journey); and We made a Font of molten brass to flow for him; and there were Jinns that worked in front of him, by the leave of his Lord, and if any of them turned aside from our command, We made him taste of the Penalty of the Blazing Fire.
rows.transliteration: walisulaymānar rīḥa ghuduwwuhā shahrun warawāḥuhā shahr ۖ wa-asalnā lahu `aynal qiṭr ۖ wa minal jinni man ya`malu bayna yadayhi bi-idhni rabbih ۖ wa man yazigh minhum `an amrinā nudhiqhu min `adhābis sa`īr

rows.arabic: يَعْمَلُونَ لَهُۥ مَا يَشَآءُ مِن مَّحَـٰرِيبَ وَتَمَـٰثِيلَ وَجِفَانٍ كَٱلْجَوَابِ وَقُدُورٍ رَّاسِيَـٰتٍ ۚ ٱعْمَلُوٓا۟ ءَالَ دَاوُۥدَ شُكْرًا ۚ وَقَلِيلٌ مِّنْ عِبَادِىَ ٱلشَّكُورُ
rows.translation: They worked for him as he desired, (making) arches, images, basons as large as reservoirs, and (cooking) cauldrons fixed (in their places): "Work ye, sons of David, with thanks! but few of My servants are grateful!"
rows.transliteration: ya`malūna lahu mā yashā-u min maḥārība watamāthīla wajifānin kal jawābi waqudūrin rāsiyāt ۚ i'-malū āla dāwūda shukrā ۚ waqalīlun min `ibādiyash shakūr

rows.arabic: فَلَمَّا قَضَيْنَا عَلَيْهِ ٱلْمَوْتَ مَا دَلَّهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَوْتِهِۦٓ إِلَّا دَآبَّةُ ٱلْأَرْضِ تَأْكُلُ مِنسَأَتَهُۥ ۖ فَلَمَّا خَرَّ تَبَيَّنَتِ ٱلْجِنُّ أَن لَّوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ ٱلْغَيْبَ مَا لَبِثُوا۟ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْمُهِينِ
rows.translation: Then, when We decreed (Solomon's) death, nothing showed them his death except a little worm of the earth, which kept (slowly) gnawing away at his staff: so when he fell down, the Jinns saw plainly that if they had known the unseen, they would not have tarried in the humiliating Penalty (of their Task).
rows.transliteration: falammā qaḍaynā `alayhil mawta mā dallahum `alā mawtihi illā dābbatul-arḍi ta-kulu minsa-atah ۖ falammā kharra tabayyanatil jinnu an law kānū ya`lamūnal ghayba mā labithū fil `adhābil muhīn

rows.arabic: لَقَدْ كَانَ لِسَبَإٍ فِى مَسْكَنِهِمْ ءَايَةٌ ۖ جَنَّتَانِ عَن يَمِينٍ وَشِمَالٍ ۖ كُلُوا۟ مِن رِّزْقِ رَبِّكُمْ وَٱشْكُرُوا۟ لَهُۥ ۚ بَلْدَةٌ طَيِّبَةٌ وَرَبٌّ غَفُورٌ
rows.translation: There was, for Saba, aforetime, a Sign in their home-land - two Gardens to the right and to the left. "Eat of the Sustenance (provided) by your Lord, and be grateful to Him: a territory fair and happy, and a Lord Oft-Forgiving!
rows.transliteration: laqad kāna lisaba-in fī maskanihim āyah ۖ jannatāni `an yamīnin washimāl ۖ kulū min rizqi rabbikum washkurū lah ۚ baldatun ṭayyibatun warabbun ghafūr

rows.arabic: فَأَعْرَضُوا۟ فَأَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَيْلَ ٱلْعَرِمِ وَبَدَّلْنَـٰهُم بِجَنَّتَيْهِمْ جَنَّتَيْنِ ذَوَاتَىْ أُكُلٍ خَمْطٍ وَأَثْلٍ وَشَىْءٍ مِّن سِدْرٍ قَلِيلٍ
rows.translation: But they turned away (from Allah), and We sent against them the Flood (released) from the dams, and We converted their two garden (rows) into "gardens" producing bitter fruit, and tamarisks, and some few (stunted) Lote-trees.
rows.transliteration: fa-a`raḍū fa-arsalnā `alayhim saylal-`arimi wabaddalnāhum bijannatayhim jannatayni dhawātay ukulin khamṭin wa-athlin washay-in min sidrin qalīl

rows.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيْنَـٰهُم بِمَا كَفَرُوا۟ ۖ وَهَلْ نُجَـٰزِىٓ إِلَّا ٱلْكَفُورَ
rows.translation: That was the Requital We gave them because they ungratefully rejected Faith: and never do We give (such) requital except to such as are ungrateful rejecters.
rows.transliteration: dhālika jazaynāhum bimā kafarū ۖ wahal nujāzī illal-kafūr

rows.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا بَيْنَهُمْ وَبَيْنَ ٱلْقُرَى ٱلَّتِى بَـٰرَكْنَا فِيهَا قُرًى ظَـٰهِرَةً وَقَدَّرْنَا فِيهَا ٱلسَّيْرَ ۖ سِيرُوا۟ فِيهَا لَيَالِىَ وَأَيَّامًا ءَامِنِينَ
rows.translation: Between them and the Cities on which We had poured our blessings, We had placed Cities in prominent positions, and between them We had appointed stages of journey in due proportion: "Travel therein, secure, by night and by day."
rows.transliteration: waja`alnā baynahum wabaynal qural latī bāraknā fīhā quran ẓāhiratan waqaddarnā fīhas sayr ۖ sīrū fīhā layāliya wa-ayyāman āminīn

rows.arabic: فَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا بَـٰعِدْ بَيْنَ أَسْفَارِنَا وَظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ أَحَادِيثَ وَمَزَّقْنَـٰهُمْ كُلَّ مُمَزَّقٍ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٍ شَكُورٍ
rows.translation: But they said: "Our Lord! Place longer distances between our journey-stages": but they wronged themselves (therein). At length We made them as a tale (that is told), and We dispersed them all in scattered fragments. Verily in this are Signs for every (soul that is) patiently constant and grateful.
rows.transliteration: faqālū rabbanā bā`id bayna asfārinā waẓalamū anfusahum faja`alnāhum aḥādītha wa mazzaqnāhum kulla mumazzaq ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin likulli ṣabbārin shakūr

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدْ صَدَّقَ عَلَيْهِمْ إِبْلِيسُ ظَنَّهُۥ فَٱتَّبَعُوهُ إِلَّا فَرِيقًا مِّنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
rows.translation: And on them did Satan prove true his idea, and they followed him, all but a party that believed.
rows.transliteration: walaqad ṣaddaqa `alayhim iblīsu ẓannahu fattaba`ūhu illā farīqan minal mu-minīn

rows.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لَهُۥ عَلَيْهِم مِّن سُلْطَـٰنٍ إِلَّا لِنَعْلَمَ مَن يُؤْمِنُ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ مِمَّنْ هُوَ مِنْهَا فِى شَكٍّ ۗ وَرَبُّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ حَفِيظٌ
rows.translation: But he had no authority over them,- except that We might test the man who believes in the Hereafter from him who is in doubt concerning it: and thy Lord doth watch over all things.
rows.transliteration: wa mā kāna lahu `alayhim min sulṭānin illā lina`lama man yu-minu bil-ākhirati mimman huwa minhā fī shakk ۗ warabbuka `alā kulli shay-in ḥafīẓ

rows.arabic: قُلِ ٱدْعُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ زَعَمْتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا لَهُمْ فِيهِمَا مِن شِرْكٍ وَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْهُم مِّن ظَهِيرٍ
rows.translation: Say: "Call upon other (gods) whom ye fancy, besides Allah: They have no power,- not the weight of an atom,- in the heavens or on earth: No (sort of) share have they therein, nor is any of them a helper to Allah.
rows.transliteration: qulid-`ul ladhīna za`amtum min dūnillāh ۖ lā yamlikūna mithqāla dharratin fis samāwāti walā fil-arḍi wa mā lahum fīhimā min shirkin wa mā lahu minhum min ẓahīr

rows.arabic: وَلَا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةُ عِندَهُۥٓ إِلَّا لِمَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُۥ ۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فُزِّعَ عَن قُلُوبِهِمْ قَالُوا۟ مَاذَا قَالَ رَبُّكُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ ٱلْحَقَّ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَلِىُّ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
rows.translation: "No intercession can avail in His Presence, except for those for whom He has granted permission. So far (is this the case) that, when terror is removed from their hearts (at the Day of Judgment, then) will they say, 'what is it that your Lord commanded?' they will say, 'That which is true and just; and He is the Most High Most Great'."
rows.transliteration: walā tanfa`ush shafā`atu `indahu illā liman adhina lah ۚ ḥattā idhā fuzzi`a `an qulūbihim qālū mādhā qāla rabbukum ۖ qālul ḥaqq ۖ wahuwal `aliyyul kabīr

rows.arabic: قُلْ مَن يَرْزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَإِنَّآ أَوْ إِيَّاكُمْ لَعَلَىٰ هُدًى أَوْ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
rows.translation: Say: "Who gives you sustenance, from the heavens and the earth?" Say: "It is Allah; and certain it is that either we or ye are on right guidance or in manifest error!"
rows.transliteration: qul man yarzuqukum minas samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ qulillāh ۖ wa innā aw iyyākum la`alā hudan aw fī ḍalālin mubīn

rows.arabic: قُل لَّا تُسْـَٔلُونَ عَمَّآ أَجْرَمْنَا وَلَا نُسْـَٔلُ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
rows.translation: Say: "Ye shall not be questioned as to our sins, nor shall we be questioned as to what ye do."
rows.transliteration: qul lā tus-alūna `ammā ajramnā walā nus-alu `ammā ta`malūn

rows.arabic: قُلْ يَجْمَعُ بَيْنَنَا رَبُّنَا ثُمَّ يَفْتَحُ بَيْنَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَهُوَ ٱلْفَتَّاحُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
rows.translation: Say: "Our Lord will gather us together and will in the end decide the matter between us (and you) in truth and justice: and He is the one to decide, the One Who knows all."
rows.transliteration: qul yajma`u baynanā rabbunā thumma yaftaḥu baynanā bil ḥaqqi wahuwal fattāḥul `alīm

rows.arabic: قُلْ أَرُونِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَلْحَقْتُم بِهِۦ شُرَكَآءَ ۖ كَلَّا ۚ بَلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
rows.translation: Say: "Show me those whom ye have joined with Him as partners: by no means (can ye). Nay, He is Allah, the Exalted in Power, the Wise."
rows.transliteration: qul arūniyal ladhīna alḥaqtum bihi shurakā-a ۖ kallā ۚ bal huwallāhul `azīzul ḥakīm

rows.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ إِلَّا كَآفَّةً لِّلنَّاسِ بَشِيرًا وَنَذِيرًا وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: We have not sent thee but as a universal (Messenger) to men, giving them glad tidings, and warning them (against sin), but most men understand not.
rows.transliteration: wa mā arsalnāka illā kāffatan linnāsi bashīran wanadhīran walākinna aktharan nāsi lā ya`lamūn

rows.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
rows.translation: They say: "When will this promise (come to pass) if ye are telling the truth?"
rows.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhal wa`du in kuntum ṣādiqīn

rows.arabic: قُل لَّكُم مِّيعَادُ يَوْمٍ لَّا تَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ عَنْهُ سَاعَةً وَلَا تَسْتَقْدِمُونَ
rows.translation: Say: "The appointment to you is for a Day, which ye cannot put back for an hour nor put forward."
rows.transliteration: qul lakum mī`ādu yawmin lā tasta-khirūna `anhu sā`atan walā tastaqdimūn

rows.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْمِنَ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ وَلَا بِٱلَّذِى بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ ۗ وَلَوْ تَرَىٰٓ إِذِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ مَوْقُوفُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ يَرْجِعُ بَعْضُهُمْ إِلَىٰ بَعْضٍ ٱلْقَوْلَ يَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتُضْعِفُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ لَوْلَآ أَنتُمْ لَكُنَّا مُؤْمِنِينَ
rows.translation: The Unbelievers say: "We shall neither believe in this scripture nor in (any) that (came) before it." Couldst thou but see when the wrong-doers will be made to stand before their Lord, throwing back the word (of blame) on one another! Those who had been despised will say to the arrogant ones: "Had it not been for you, we should certainly have been believers!"
rows.transliteration: waqālal ladhīna kafarū lan nu-mina bihādhal qur-āni walā bil ladhī bayna yadayh ۗ walaw tarā idhiẓ ẓālimūna mawqūfūna `inda rabbihim yarji`u ba`ḍuhum ilā ba`ḍinil-qawla yaqūlul ladhīnas-tuḍ`ifū lilladhīnas-takbarū lawlā antum lakunnā mu-minīn

rows.arabic: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسْتُضْعِفُوٓا۟ أَنَحْنُ صَدَدْنَـٰكُمْ عَنِ ٱلْهُدَىٰ بَعْدَ إِذْ جَآءَكُم ۖ بَلْ كُنتُم مُّجْرِمِينَ
rows.translation: The arrogant ones will say to those who had been despised: "Was it we who kept you back from Guidance after it reached you? Nay, rather, it was ye who transgressed.
rows.transliteration: qālal ladhīnas-takbarū lilladhīnas-tuḍ`ifū anaḥnu ṣadadnākum `anil hudā ba`da idh jā-akum ۖ bal kuntum mujrimīn

rows.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتُضْعِفُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ بَلْ مَكْرُ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذْ تَأْمُرُونَنَآ أَن نَّكْفُرَ بِٱللَّهِ وَنَجْعَلَ لَهُۥٓ أَندَادًا ۚ وَأَسَرُّوا۟ ٱلنَّدَامَةَ لَمَّا رَأَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلْأَغْلَـٰلَ فِىٓ أَعْنَاقِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ هَلْ يُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
rows.translation: Those who had been despised will say to the arrogant ones: "Nay! it was a plot (of yours) by day and by night: Behold! Ye (constantly) ordered us to be ungrateful to Allah and to attribute equals to Him!" They will declare (their) repentance when they see the Penalty: We shall put yokes on the necks of the Unbelievers: It would only be a requital for their (ill) Deeds.
rows.transliteration: waqālal ladhīnas-tuḍ`ifū lilladhīnas-takbarū bal makrul layli wan nahāri idh ta-murūnanā an nakfura billāhi wanaj`ala lahu andādā ۚ wa-asarrun nadāmata lammā ra-awul `adhāba waja`alnal-aghlāla fī a`nāqil ladhīna kafarū ۚ hal yujzawna illā mā kānū ya`malūn

rows.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا فِى قَرْيَةٍ مِّن نَّذِيرٍ إِلَّا قَالَ مُتْرَفُوهَآ إِنَّا بِمَآ أُرْسِلْتُم بِهِۦ كَـٰفِرُونَ
rows.translation: Never did We send a warner to a population, but the wealthy ones among them said: "We believe not in the (Message) with which ye have been sent."
rows.transliteration: wa mā arsalnā fī qaryatim min nadhīrin illā qāla mutrafūhā innā bimā ursiltum bihi kāfirūn

rows.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ نَحْنُ أَكْثَرُ أَمْوَٰلًا وَأَوْلَـٰدًا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
rows.translation: They said: "We have more in wealth and in sons, and we cannot be punished."
rows.transliteration: waqālū naḥnu aktharu amwālan wa-awlādan wa mā naḥnu bimu`adhhabīn

rows.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّى يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقْدِرُ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: Say: "Verily my Lord enlarges and restricts the Provision to whom He pleases, but most men understand not."
rows.transliteration: qul inna rabbī yabsuṭur rizqa liman yashā-u wayaqdiru walākinna aktharan nāsi lā ya`lamūn

rows.arabic: وَمَآ أَمْوَٰلُكُمْ وَلَآ أَوْلَـٰدُكُم بِٱلَّتِى تُقَرِّبُكُمْ عِندَنَا زُلْفَىٰٓ إِلَّا مَنْ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ جَزَآءُ ٱلضِّعْفِ بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَهُمْ فِى ٱلْغُرُفَـٰتِ ءَامِنُونَ
rows.translation: It is not your wealth nor your sons, that will bring you nearer to Us in degree: but only those who believe and work righteousness - these are the ones for whom there is a multiplied Reward for their deeds, while secure they (reside) in the dwellings on high!
rows.transliteration: wa mā amwālukum walā awlādukum bil latī tuqarribukum `indanā zulfā illā man āmana wa`amila ṣāliḥan fa-ulā-ika lahum jazā-uḍ ḍi`fi bimā `amilū wahum fil ghurufāti āminūn

rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَسْعَوْنَ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِنَا مُعَـٰجِزِينَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ مُحْضَرُونَ
rows.translation: Those who strive against Our Signs, to frustrate them, will be given over into Punishment.
rows.transliteration: wal ladhīna yas`awna fī āyātinā mu`ājizīna ulā-ika fil `adhābi muḥḍarūn

rows.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّى يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَقْدِرُ لَهُۥ ۚ وَمَآ أَنفَقْتُم مِّن شَىْءٍ فَهُوَ يُخْلِفُهُۥ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
rows.translation: Say: "Verily my Lord enlarges and restricts the Sustenance to such of his servants as He pleases: and nothing do ye spend in the least (in His cause) but He replaces it: for He is the Best of those who grant Sustenance.
rows.transliteration: qul inna rabbī yabsuṭur rizqa liman yashā-u min `ibādihi wayaqdiru lah ۚ wa mā anfaqtum min shay-in fahuwa yukhlifuh ۖ wahuwa khayrur rāziqīn

rows.arabic: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يَقُولُ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ أَهَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِيَّاكُمْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ
rows.translation: One Day He will gather them all together, and say to the angels, "Was it you that these men used to worship?"
rows.transliteration: wayawma yaḥshuruhum jamī`an thumma yaqūlu lil-malā-ikati ahā-ulā-i iyyākum kānū ya`budūn

rows.arabic: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ أَنتَ وَلِيُّنَا مِن دُونِهِم ۖ بَلْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ ٱلْجِنَّ ۖ أَكْثَرُهُم بِهِم مُّؤْمِنُونَ
rows.translation: They will say, "Glory to Thee! our (tie) is with Thee - as Protector - not with them. Nay, but they worshipped the Jinns: most of them believed in them."
rows.transliteration: qālū subḥānaka anta waliyyunā min dūnihim ۖ bal kānū ya`budūnal jinn ۖ aktharuhum bihim mu-minūn

rows.arabic: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا يَمْلِكُ بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ نَّفْعًا وَلَا ضَرًّا وَنَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
rows.translation: So on that Day no power shall they have over each other, for profit or harm: and We shall say to the wrong-doers, "Taste ye the Penalty of the Fire,- the which ye were wont to deny!"
rows.transliteration: fal yawma lā yamliku ba`ḍukum liba`ḍin naf`an walā ḍarran wanaqūlu lilladhīna ẓalamū dhūqū `adhāban nāril latī kuntum bihā tukadhhibūn

rows.arabic: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا بَيِّنَـٰتٍ قَالُوا۟ مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ يُرِيدُ أَن يَصُدَّكُمْ عَمَّا كَانَ يَعْبُدُ ءَابَآؤُكُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ إِفْكٌ مُّفْتَرًى ۚ وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
rows.translation: When Our Clear Signs are rehearsed to them, they say, "This is only a man who wishes to hinder you from the (worship) which your fathers practised." And they say, "This is only a falsehood invented!" and the Unbelievers say of the Truth when it comes to them, "This is nothing but evident magic!"
rows.transliteration: wa idhā tutlā `alayhim āyātunā bayyinātin qālū mā hādhā illā rajulun yurīdu an yaṣuddakum `ammā kāna ya`budu ābā-ukum waqālū mā hādhā illā ifkun muftarā ۚ waqālal ladhīna kafarū lilḥaqqi lammā jā-ahum in hādhā illā siḥrun mubīn

rows.arabic: وَمَآ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُم مِّن كُتُبٍ يَدْرُسُونَهَا ۖ وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهِمْ قَبْلَكَ مِن نَّذِيرٍ
rows.translation: But We had not given them Books which they could study, nor sent messengers to them before thee as Warners.
rows.transliteration: wa mā ātaynāhum min kutubiy yadrusūnahā ۖ wa mā arsalnā ilayhim qablaka min nadhīr

rows.arabic: وَكَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ وَمَا بَلَغُوا۟ مِعْشَارَ مَآ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ فَكَذَّبُوا۟ رُسُلِى ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
rows.translation: And their predecessors rejected (the Truth); these have not received a tenth of what We had granted to those: yet when they rejected My messengers, how (terrible) was My rejection (of them)!
rows.transliteration: wakadhhabal ladhīna min qablihim wa mā balaghū mi`shāra mā ātaynāhum fakadhhabū rusulī ۖ fakayfa kāna nakīr

rows.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَعِظُكُم بِوَٰحِدَةٍ ۖ أَن تَقُومُوا۟ لِلَّهِ مَثْنَىٰ وَفُرَٰدَىٰ ثُمَّ تَتَفَكَّرُوا۟ ۚ مَا بِصَاحِبِكُم مِّن جِنَّةٍ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ لَّكُم بَيْنَ يَدَىْ عَذَابٍ شَدِيدٍ
rows.translation: Say: "I do admonish you on one point: that ye do stand up before Allah,- (It may be) in pairs, or (it may be) singly,- and reflect (within yourselves): your Companion is not possessed: he is no less than a warner to you, in face of a terrible Penalty."
rows.transliteration: qul innamā a`iẓukum biwāḥidah ۖ an taqūmū lillāhi mathnā wafurādā thumma tatafakkarū ۚ mā biṣāḥibikum min jinnah ۚ in huwa illā nadhīrul lakum bayna yaday `adhābin shadīd

rows.arabic: قُلْ مَا سَأَلْتُكُم مِّنْ أَجْرٍ فَهُوَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
rows.translation: Say: "No reward do I ask of you: it is (all) in your interest: my reward is only due from Allah: And He is witness to all things."
rows.transliteration: qul mā sa-altukum min ajrin fahuwa lakum ۖ in ajriya illā `alallāh ۖ wahuwa `alā kulli shay-in shahīd

rows.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّى يَقْذِفُ بِٱلْحَقِّ عَلَّـٰمُ ٱلْغُيُوبِ
rows.translation: Say: "Verily my Lord doth cast the (mantle of) Truth (over His servants),- He that has full knowledge of (all) that is hidden."
rows.transliteration: qul inna rabbī yaqdhifu bil ḥaqqi `allāmul ghuyūb

rows.arabic: قُلْ جَآءَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَمَا يُبْدِئُ ٱلْبَـٰطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ
rows.translation: Say: "The Truth has arrived, and Falsehood neither creates anything new, nor restores anything."
rows.transliteration: qul jā-al ḥaqqu wa mā yubdi-ul bāṭilu wa mā yu`īd

rows.arabic: قُلْ إِن ضَلَلْتُ فَإِنَّمَآ أَضِلُّ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِى ۖ وَإِنِ ٱهْتَدَيْتُ فَبِمَا يُوحِىٓ إِلَىَّ رَبِّىٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ سَمِيعٌ قَرِيبٌ
rows.translation: Say: "If I am astray, I only stray to the loss of my own soul: but if I receive guidance, it is because of the inspiration of my Lord to me: it is He Who hears all things, and is (ever) near."
rows.transliteration: qul in ḍalaltu fa-innamā aḍillu `alā nafsī ۖ wa inih-tadaytu fabimā yūḥī ilayya rabbī ۚ innahu samī`un qarīb

rows.arabic: وَلَوْ تَرَىٰٓ إِذْ فَزِعُوا۟ فَلَا فَوْتَ وَأُخِذُوا۟ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
rows.translation: If thou couldst but see when they will quake with terror; but then there will be no escape (for them), and they will be seized from a position (quite) near.
rows.transliteration: walaw tarā idh fazi`ū falā fawta wa-ukhidhū min makānin qarīb

rows.arabic: وَقَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلتَّنَاوُشُ مِن مَّكَانٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
rows.translation: And they will say, "We do believe (now) in the (Truth)"; but how could they receive (Faith) from a position (so far off,-
rows.transliteration: waqālū āmannā bihi wa-annā lahumut tanāwushu min makānin ba`īd

rows.arabic: وَقَدْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِهِۦ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَيَقْذِفُونَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ مِن مَّكَانٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
rows.translation: Seeing that they did reject Faith (entirely) before, and that they (continually) cast (slanders) on the unseen from a position far off?
rows.transliteration: waqad kafarū bihi min qabl ۖ wayaqdhifūna bil ghaybi min makānin ba`īd

rows.arabic: وَحِيلَ بَيْنَهُمْ وَبَيْنَ مَا يَشْتَهُونَ كَمَا فُعِلَ بِأَشْيَاعِهِم مِّن قَبْلُ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ فِى شَكٍّ مُّرِيبٍۭ
rows.translation: And between them and their desires, is placed a barrier, as was done in the past with their partisans: for they were indeed in suspicious (disquieting) doubt.
rows.transliteration: waḥīla baynahum wabayna mā yashtahūna kamā fu`ila bi-ashyā`ihim min qabl ۚ innahum kānū fī shakkin murīb
